item.title: CS 420
item.description: Logistics Zoom link Communicated Piazza Join Class recordings Class notes Official Description Fundamental issues in design and development of parallel programs for various types of parallel computers. Various programming models according to both machine type and application area. Cost models, debugging, and performance evaluation of parallel programs with actual application examples. Course Information: Same as CSE 402 and ECE 492.
